definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The winter Olympics are usually held two years before the Summer Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 冬運會通常比夏運會早兩年舉行。

sentences.english: Only Scandinavians have won gold medals in the men's winter Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 只有北歐人獲得了冬運會男子越野滑雪項目中的金牌。

sentences.english: The sixth Asian Winter Games raised its curtain last evening in Changchun, China.
sentences.chinese: 第六屆亞洲冬運會週日晚在中國重慶拉開帷幕。

sentences.english: The team is preparing for taking part in the coming winter games.
sentences.chinese: 這支隊伍正在爲即將舉行的冬運會做準備。
